name: Castle Adventure (Darren Hogan)
description:
Controls

  • Movement - W,A,S,D
  • Jump - Space
  • Look Around - Mouse

My 3rd year college assignment of a multi-level castle in Unity. The castle was made using 3DS Max and texturing using Photoshop. Each level of the castle is distinct from one another each with its own purpose (e.g. bedroom, armory, etc.). The player can interact with the doors by approaching them. 

Furniture models are not my own work and were sourced from Sketchfab.
